text:
Trying a webapp that has an embedded Jython interpreter.
The webapp connects to an external debugger called PyDev and for some reason Tomcat hangs this connection up after few interactions between the app and the debugger (e.g. instruction step).
It works flawlessly in a regular application and even in Jetty.
We tried both embedded tomcat and deployed the webapp on a Tomcat server.
Getting the same issue.
